Features.Name: Sort Test Run Results

Steps.Name: you navigate to the test html report from an unsorted test run with passing, skipped, and failed scenarios
you click when the area 6 title line is visible
you click when the feature 13 name is visible
you will see the feature 13 name has text 'My Feature 12 Third' because it was the first feature alphabetically
you will see the scenario 33 name has text 'My Scenario 30 Unsorted 38 Sorted' because it is the first scenario alphabetically
you navigate to the test html report from a fully sorted test run with passing, skipped, and failed scenarios
you click when the area 6 title line is visible
you click when the feature 13 name is visible
you will see the feature 13 name has text 'My Feature 13 First' because it was sorted to be first
you will see the scenario 33 name has text 'My Scenario 35 Unsorted 30 Sorted' because it is the first scenario sorted
you navigate to the test html report from a test run with passing, skipped, and failed scenarios
you click when the area 9 title line is visible
you click when the feature 19 name is visible
you will see the feature 19 name has text 'My Feature 0 Unsorted' because it was the second in the feature sort
